physical_examinations.vital_signs: S-Ca: 2.17 mM, S-PO4: 0.99 mM, iPTH: 1220 pg/mL, S-AP: 1645 U/L, S-creatinine: 0.37 mg/dL, 25(OH)D: 5.6 ng/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Severe bilateral valgus deformity, muscle weakness; no bony pain; otherwise normal examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Rickets resolved with treatment, no further surgeries required.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: S-Ca: 3.1 mM, S-PO4: 1.19 mM, iPTH: 158 pg/mL, S-AP: 890 U/L, 25(OH)D: 24.7 ng/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Elevated serum calcium, normal serum phosphate, lowered but still high PTH and alkaline phosphatase, persistent hypocalciuria.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Elevated serum calcium and reduced PTH after vitamin D and calcium treatment.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: S-Ca: 3.23 mM, S-PO4: 0.89 mM, iPTH: 101 pg/mL, S-AP: 113 U/L, 25(OH)D: 12.6 ng/mL
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Even higher serum calcium level with persistently elevated PTH, normal vitamin D level.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Continued decline in PTH and elevation in calcium despite cessation of therapy.
